response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 6
response.overview: A total of 10 episodes of horror footage that permeates the five senses!! It was used as an air raid shelter during the war... [Fireworks] Fireworks are a summer tradition. In the midst of having fun, something inhuman appears... [Toilet in a hospital] It is said that inpatients often go mad in the toilet of a certain hospital. What is the true identity? Spooky rumors keep popping up. A total of 10 episodes of terrifying images that cannot be seen by one person are recorded, such as whether the cause was reflected in the video.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 6
